com.sun.mail.util

Class PropUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.mail.util.PropUtil

  • public class PropUtil
extends Object
    Utilities to make it easier to get property values. Properties can be strings or type-specific value objects.
    Author:
    Bill Shannon
